Choosing heirloom grains, koji and bespoke yeasts to ferment in-house, our one-off spirits reflect the time and place they came from: a product made in spring might taste different to one made in the fall. To help us highlight those differences, we have designed and built equipment that allows us to distill at 10Â°C, rather than boiling all the flavour away

Organic barley.
Douglas fir. Picked north of Copenhagen.

Our homemade vacuum still, Diessel. Operates at 10 degrees celcius.
